item.title: Violent Video Games: A Simple Data Analysis
item.description: Note: All source code can be found on this Github repo. Introduction In the last post, I explored the existing literature on violent video games and violent crime. If you recall, the studies I shared found that an increase in violent video game sales was associated with a decrease in violent crime. To see whether these counterintuitive results held up, I ran a quick and dirty linear regression with violent video game sales as the predictor variable and the violent crime rate in the US as the outcome variable.
